Headline: #22 Clark and #151 Sheridan Temporary Northbound  rerouted near Ridge and Clark.
ShortDescription: Northbound 22 Clark and 151 Sheridan  buses are temp rerouted via Lake Shore Drive, Hollywood, Ridge and Clark.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #22 Clark and #151 Sheridan  buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore Drive, Hollywood, Ridge and Clark due to street blockage near  Bryn Mawr/ Winthrop.

Southbound buses are not affected.
Allow extra travel time.

Headline: North-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Harlem O'Hare
ShortDescription: North-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Harlem O'Hare due to a mechanical problem on a train Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section: North-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Harlem O'Hare due to a mechanical problem on a train Crews working to restore service.
